item.description:
As summer draws to a close, we thought it would be great to have an "End of Summer Integral Potluck!" Discussion for the evening will focus on the topics raised during our recent Advanced Integral Workshop with Clint Fuhs. For those who attended, you can attest to the dense content of Integral Calculus, as well as the exciting new developments from Ken. Come hang out, eat some good food, and enjoy the "We" space!

**a note about food- please keep in mind that many are vegetarians when planning to bring an item. Samadhi will provide drinks and paper goods including utensils. Check the RSVP list for a headcount**
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group August Meetup
